mapper.select: select rn, t_num, t_subject, content, t_regdate, nvl(ratingAvg, 0) as ratingAvg from ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ratingAvg DESC NULLS LAST) AS rn, t_num, t_subject, content, t_regdate, ratingAvg FROM ( select t.t_num, t.t_subject, t.content, t.t_regdate, (SELECT AVG(rt.rating) FROM rating rt WHERE rt.t_num = t.t_num) AS ratingAvg FROM trip t ) ) where rn <= 6

SELECT rn, t_num, t_subject, content, t_regdate, nvl(ratingAvg,0) as ratingAvg FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY t.t_num DESC) AS rn, t.t_num, t.t_subject, t.content, t.t_regdate, (SELECT AVG(rt.rating) FROM rating rt WHERE rt.t_num = t.t_num) AS ratingAvg FROM trip t
WHERE t_subject LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
WHERE content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
WHERE t_subject LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY t_num DESC
ORDER BY ratingAvg DESC NULLS LAST , t_num DESC
) WHERE rn between ${(pageNum -1) * pageRowCount} +1 and ${(pageNum -1) * pageRowCount} + ${pageRowCount}

SELECT count(*) FROM trip
AND t_subject LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND t_subject LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
